post:
Hello,

Don't yet have the budget for a fully managed dedicated server?

Aren't quite ready to make the leap to a dedicated server?

Aren't ready to make the financial commitment to move to a dedicated server?

If any of the above questions' answer for you is YES, then WebHosting UK semi-dedicated hosting server is the answer for you.

WebHosting UK Semi Dedicated Server is a Dedicated Server which is shared only between 8 clients. With our Semi-dedicated Server Hosting Plan you enjoy all the same benefits of a Dedicated server, you have access to a large portion of the server resources, allowing you to run more traffic and resource intensive websites as well as more complex scripts and softwares without CPU latency becoming an issue.

As a semi-dedicated server client you need not worry about the system administration resources and server management, as WebHosting UK takes utmost care of the server administration and any other technical concerns that may arise.

Server Specifications:
Core 2 Duo Quad Core Xeon Q6600, 8MB Cache
8GB RAM
8 Accounts Hosted Per Server

LINUX - SEMI-DEDICATED PLAN
50 GB Space
700 GB Bandwidth
1GB Guaranteed RAM
Linux CentOS 5.0
Root SSH Access
100 Mbps Connection
2 Dedicated IP
Setup Free
30 Day Money Back Guarantee
Price: £44.99 / Month

WINDOWS - SEMI-DEDICATED PLAN

Administrator RDP Access

Should you have any queries, feel free to PM me or contact us through our Live Chat support on our website or mail us at sales @ webhosting.UK.com
